scripts.build:standalone: bun build ./src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-arm64 --outfile dist/xld-macos-apple-silicon --packages=external && bun build ./src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-darwin-x64 --outfile dist/xld-macos-intel --packages=external && bun build ./src/index.ts --compile --target=bun-linux-x64 --outfile dist/xld-linux-x64 --packages=external
scripts.release:patch: bun version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: bun version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:major: bun version major && git push && git push --tags
